nodes.text: Ershack was a colonel in the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He was responsible of the operations in the Kubilaï system and its vicinity.

Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, Ershack sent a team of Rebel operatives investigating on the Solemnis disappearance. The ship conveyed an important loading of Ytterbium, stolen during an attack against an Imperial base on Abelard one month sooner.
Ershack was created by Jean Balczesak for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario L'écume de l'espace which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 44.
